mapper.sql: id, gmt_created, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, version, user_id, role_id, enable
mapper.insert: insert into moneyfeed.uc_pm_user_role (gmt_created, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, version, user_id, role_id, enable ) values (#{model.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{model.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{model.creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, 0, #{model.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.enable,jdbcType=BIT} )
